0.1.name: wordpress/real-estate-crm-web-to-lead
0.1.description:
Real Estate CRM web-to-lead plugin allows you to publish your agents images on the blog, place contact forms in the sidebar and push leads to Real Estate Cloud CRM

Real Estate CRM is FREE for single agents.

This plugin requires Real Estate Cloud to operate, sign up here: http://www.realestatecloud.co/sign-up/

Main Functionality:

  • Generates Contact forms
  • Generates the images of the agents by pulling the info from Real Estate Cloud
  • Generates agent description by pulling the info from Real Estate Cloud
  • Works "out of the box" on 95% of themes without any customization
  • Works with dsIDXpress - hijacks the lead info and pushes it to Real Estate Cloud

Here is an example of Real Estate CRM web-to-lead p
